title: Realme C75 5G launches with Dimensity 6300 SoC, low price
description: Realme launched the 4G-only C75 in December, and today this has received a 5G-capable sibling as well. The Realme C75 5G is now official in India, where it starts at INR 12,999 (approximately $153 or €135 at the current exchange rates) and is available through the brand's official online store. For that amount of cash, you get 4GB of RAM and 128GB of storage. Or you can have 6GB of RAM for INR 13,999 ($165, €146). The phone comes with a 6.67-inch 720x1604 LCD screen with 120 Hz refresh rate and 625-nit peak brightness, and the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset at the helm. The C75...
excerpt: It comes in three lily-inspired colorways. Realme launched the 4G-only C75 in December, and today this has received a 5G-capable sibling as well. The...
text: Realme launched the 4G-only C75 in December, and today this has received a 5G-capable sibling as well. The Realme C75 5G is now official in India, where it starts at INR 12,999 (approximately $153 or €135 at the current exchange rates) and is available through the brand's official online store. For that amount of cash, you get 4GB of RAM and 128GB of storage. Or you can have 6GB of RAM for INR 13,999 ($165, €146). The phone comes with a 6.67-inch 720x1604 LCD screen with 120 Hz refresh rate and 625-nit peak brightness, and the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset at the helm. The C75 5G has a 32 MP camera on the rear, a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, and a 6,000 mAh battery with support for 45W wired charging. It's IP64 certified for dust and water resistance and MIL-STD-810H tested for ruggedness and shock resistance. It measures 165.7 x 76.22 x 7.94 mm and weighs 190g. It runs Android 15 with Realme UI 6.0 on top. It's offered in three colorways: Lily White, Purple Blossom, and Midnight Lily.
html:
Realme launched the 4G-only C75 in December, and today this has received a 5G-capable sibling as well. The Realme C75 5G is now official in India, where it starts at INR 12,999 (approximately $153 or €135 at the current exchange rates) and is available through the brand's official online store.

For that amount of cash, you get 4GB of RAM and 128GB of storage. Or you can have 6GB of RAM for INR 13,999 ($165, €146). The phone comes with a 6.67-inch 720x1604 LCD screen with 120 Hz refresh rate and 625-nit peak brightness, and the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset at the helm.

The C75 5G has a 32 MP camera on the rear, a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, and a 6,000 mAh battery with support for 45W wired charging. It's IP64 certified for dust and water resistance and MIL-STD-810H tested for ruggedness and shock resistance. It measures 165.7 x 76.22 x 7.94 mm and weighs 190g. It runs Android 15 with Realme UI 6.0 on top. It's offered in three colorways: Lily White, Purple Blossom, and Midnight Lily.
